Title: The Queen's Chains
Description:
Ansurek... that worm, that witless, gutless little--

<Y'tekhi growls under their breath, struggling to maintain their composure.>

If this is what's become of Neferess, we must free her. She is still our queen. My mistress will know what to do.

When the Weaver discovers what they've all done, there will not be a crevice deep enough to escape her wrath.
RewardText: Remember when I said I'd let you know when we're in over our heads? This is it.

Objectives.Text: Convince Y'tekhi this is a bad idea
